SortedBlock class (a class that determines sort order).

This is the class that determines sort order.

compare

  public int compare(Object anObject1,
                     Object anObject2)




  
 Compare two Objects based on the algorithm in this block.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 anObject1 - First Object to compare
    
 anObject2 - Second Object to compare
    
 Returns:
    
 int Return of compare, 0 is equal, 1 is greater than -1 is
less than.
